objects.description: [PlugX](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0013) has used to use DLL side-loading to evade anti-virus and to maintain persistence on a victim.

PwC and BAE Systems. (2017, April). Operation Cloud Hopper: Technical Annex. Retrieved April 13, 2017.
